Please try installing to a different location. %sCDKey %1$s CD-Key: %sExpansionCorrupted The %1$s language specific data is badly corrupted and has been removed. If you wish to play World of Warcraft with the %1$s language pack, please download and apply the %1$s language pack from www.wow-europe.com. %sExpectedVersion%d.%d.%d.%d This update requires "%1$s" version %2$d.%3$d.%4$d.%5$d. %sExpectedVersion%d.%d.%d.%dExactlyButYouHaveNewer%d.%d.%d.%d This update does not need to be applied. It requires version %2$d.%3$d.%4$d.%5$d of "%1$s", but you already have version %6$d.%7$d.%8$d.%9$d. %sExpectedVersion%d.%d.%d.%dExactlyButYouHaveOlder%d.%d.%d.%d This update requires "%1$s" version %2$d.%3$d.%4$d.%5$d. You have an older version, %6$d.%7$d.%8$d.%9$d. %sExpectedVersion%d.%d.%d.%dOrNewerButYouHave%d.%d.%d.%d This update requires "%1$s" version %2$d.%3$d.%4$d.%5$d or later. You have an older version, %6$d.%7$d.%8$d.%9$d. %sExpectedVersion%d.%d.%d.%dOrOlderButYouHave%d.%d.%d.%d This update does not need to be applied. It requires a version of "%1$s" older than %2$d.%3$d.%4$d.%5$d, but you already have version %6$d.%7$d.%8$d.%9$d. %sNotExpectingVersion%d.%d.%d.%d This update requires a version of "%1$s" other than %2$d.%3$d.%4$d.%5$d. ContactTechSupport If this problem persists, you may be able to solve it by uninstalling and then reinstalling the game.
